content: **you can now knit two different version of this pattern original pumpkin socks and pumpkin latte socks both patterns are included when you purchase** *the windows along the street come alive with a burnt orange glow the faces of cats and jacks and abstract snarls flicker when each houses pumpkin lantern is lit with a single tealight some adorning the porches too all are celebrating the chill air and warm fire of october * i love pumpkins the bright orange brings a pop of colour to winter evenings and rainy days these socks are worked top down the pattern is fun and engaging instructions for a heel flap and gusset and modified wedge toe the pumpkin stitch pattern is worked on the front of the sock only and is written and charted **sizes** small medium large finished sock circumference unstretched 18 20 5 23 cm / 7 8 9 **skill level** a basic understanding of sock construction knitting in the round simple knit and purl stitches cables increases decreases and how to kitchener stitch this pattern has been tested and tech edited
